page.title: 18Pontarddulais News 19.7.85
page.content:
The following were among the many items of news in the local press.
1.Cricket. Dafen sweep unbeaten Pontarddulais off their perch at the top of the premier league of the SWCA table. 2.The seventh annual patrons dinner was held at the Pontarddulais Rugby clubhouse. 3.Pupils of the Primary School had a chance to display their talents in their annual Summer Show. 4.The Primary School PTA held its annual Summer Fete. 5.The Pontarddulais Male Voice under their conductor Noel Davies appeared in a concert at Gorseinon in aid of funds for the creation of a sports complex at Kingsbridge.
